db:abstract.db:para: The Stickman example shows how to animate transitions in a state machine to implement key frame animations.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS += stickman.h \ animation.h \ node.h \ lifecycle.h \ graphicsview.h \ rectbutton.h SOURCES += main.cpp \ stickman.cpp \ animation.cpp \ node.cpp \ lifecycle.cpp \ graphicsview.cpp \ rectbutton.cpp
RESOURCES += stickman.qrc
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/animation/stickman INSTALLS += target
